metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5192 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: When using the local_batch client from salt-api in SaltStack Salt before 2015.8.13, 2016.3.x before 2016.3.5, and 2016.11.x before 2016.11.2, external authentication is not respected, enabling all authentication to be bypassed. The LocalClient.cmd_batch() method client does not accept external_auth credentials and so access to it from salt-api has been removed for now. This vulnerability allows code execution for already-authenticated users and is only in effect when running salt-api as the root user.

criterions.comment: salt package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
